basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli KCTC 1682 (MIC=6.25-12.5 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637 (MIC=12.5 µM), Proteus vulgaris (MIC=3.125 µM).Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1918 (MIC=1.56 µM), Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621 (MIC=6.25 µM), Bacillus megaterium KCTC 1096 (MIC=3.125 µM).
